head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WOODS, ELISABETH R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WOODS, ELISABETH R.

block.p: WOODS-Elisabeth R. Beloved wife of James A. Woods for 44 years. Mother of James A. Woods Jr., of Alexandria, VA, Robert L. Woods of Cold Spring Harbor, NY, Elisabeth W. Leonard of North Palm Beach, FL, and William R. Woods, of Huntington Bay, NY. Grandmother of seven grandchildren. A memorial service will be held on Tuesday, September 12, at 11:30 AM, at St. John's Church, Cold Spring Harbor, NY. In lieu of flowers donations can be made to St. John's Church, PO Box 266, Cold Spring Harbor, NY 11724.
